title: How to reboot/restart your Google Pixel
content:
No OS is absolutely perfect, and if you’ve spent anytime at all on a smartphone, you’ll know that sometimes you just need to reboot your device. This guide will take you through why you might want to reboot, and how to restart the Google Pixel on Android 12.

more…

The post How to reboot/restart your Google Pixel appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Android 12 has its bugs, like many other operating systems. Here's how to reboot and hard restart your Google Pixel.
